mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (emp_no, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_contents) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContents})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_contents = #{noticeContents} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_file (notice_no, file_name, origin_name, file_size, file_type) VALUES (#{noticeNo}, #{fileName}, #{originName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType})
mapper.select: SELECT dept_no deptNo, dept_name deptName FROM dept
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp (emp_name, emp_email, emp_pw, dept_no, emp_role) VALUES (#{empName}, #{empEmail}, #{empPw}, #{deptNo}, #{empRole})
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no prfNo, e.emp_name prfName, e.dept_no deptNo, IFNULL(d.dept_name, '미배정') deptName, e.emp_email prfEmail , e.emp_phone prfPhone, e.emp_birth prfBirth , e.emp_img prfImg FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT dept_no, dept_name FROM dept) d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{prfNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_no, dept_no, student_pw, student_name, student_state) VALUES (#{studentNo}, #{deptNo}, #{studentPw}, #{studentName}, #{studentState})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(student_no) FROM student WHERE student_no = #{studentNo}
